creator: serg_main@yahoo.com
text:
This is bug is continue of http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?
id=39546

Test case is portlet application for Pluto 1.1 and contain only MyFaces and 
Pluto code

creator: serg_main@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 18289
Trace log, which show what ExtensionFilter not invoked

creator: serg_main@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 18290
portlet with testcase, w/o any jars

list of jars, whish must be placed in WEB-INF/lib:
commons-beanutils-1.7.0.jar
commons-codec-1.3.jar
commons-collections-3.1.jar
commons-digester-1.7.jar
commons-el.jar
commons-fileupload-1.1.jar
commons-lang-2.1.jar
commons-logging-1.0.4.jar
commons-validator.jar
jakarta-oro.jar
log4j-1.2.9.jar
myfaces-api-1.1.2.jar
myfaces-impl-1.1.2.jar
tomahawk-1.1.2.jar

creator: serg_main@yahoo.com
text:
How to use test case:
- checkout pluto 1.1
- build and install pluto
- unzip testsuite_jsf.war in temp dir
- add needed jars (see comment for attachment)
- deploy testsuite_jsf in context /testsuite_jsf
- copy pluto-portal-driver-config.xml to /pluto/WEB-INF dir
- run pluto

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I answered on the other case. Please don't open a new one.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39546 ***
